name: Winnti Pipemon Characteristics
description: Detects specific process characteristics of Winnti Pipemon malware reported by ESET
false_positives: Legitimate setups that use similar flags
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*setup0.exe\ \-p* OR (process.command_line:*setup.exe* AND process.command_line:(*\-x\:0 OR *\-x\:1 OR *\-x\:2)))`
